channel.title: [525 adding npc's[525]
channel.description:
So i just started to code a 525 and i wanted a wizard teleporting people around, so i coded it, compiled and ran the server , then the npc doesn't appear pls help?
[code]<npc> <id>872</id> <location> <x>3087</x> <y>3503</y> <z>0</z> </location> <walkType>RANGE</walkType> <minimumCoords> <x>3088</x> <y>3500</y> <z>0</z> </minimumCoords> <maximumCoords> <x>3086</x> <y>3496</y> <z>0</z> </maximumCoords> </npc> [/code]
